description:
Clients in Stroudsburg and the surrounding areas of Pennsylvania can turn to the law firm of Abrahamsen, Conaboy & Abrahamsen for qualified guidance and compassionate support in personal injury and wrongful death cases. Our attorneys are committed to fighting for justice on your behalf while standing up to insurance companies when necessary in order to secure the compensation you deserve. Dedicated to the rights of injured and disabled individuals and workers, we are prepared to fight for your recovery in the courtroom or at the negotiating table.

With over 100 years of combined experience, we understand your concerns. Our team takes the time to listen, carefully investigate your case, protect your rights and pursue the maximum amount of compensation to which you are entitled. Our law office has handled thousands of personal injury cases, recovering millions of dollars for our clients, and we take injury and accident cases involving the following:

  • Medical malpractice
  • Mesothelioma and asbestos exposure
  • Workers' compensation claims
  • Dangerous property conditions and consumer products
  • Construction accidents
  • Trucking and motor vehicle accidents

Our experienced attorneys are also prepared to handle complications with the insurance company that may be standing in the way of a full and fair recovery. We assist Pennsylvania clients in cases pertaining to bad faith insurance practices, denied claims, litigation, appeals and more. We will fight for coverage of accident-related losses, including medical bills, lost income and quality of life. Our goal at Abrahamsen, Conaboy & Abrahamsen is to secure what you need to rebuild your life and move forward.

We are happy to discuss your legal options, and you can schedule a free initial consultation to speak with a lawyer at our Stroudsburg location by calling our law office or by visiting our website today. Our law firm also currently offers virtual consultations to ensure your health and safety during these uncertain times.
